page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN SEVERN STOKE
page.content: Until recently virtually the sole form of employment in the area was in {agriculture,}though now the majority of people living in the villages around Severn Stoke work in{Worcester or{Upton Upon Severn.}While agriculture remains the dominant land use in the area this is not reflected in the employment structure. The large number of retirement homes in this area means that Severn Stoke has a much higher percentage of {dependant population}than might otherwise be expected for such a small area.
